<< audiowrite Audio playback isplaying >>

beep

Produces a beep sound.

Syntax

beep
beep(str)
str = beep

Input argument

str

a string: 'on' or 'off'.

Output argument

str

a string: 'on' or 'off'.

Description

beep produces an beep system.

Example

beep('off')
beep
beep('on')
beep
s = beep

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
